title: Riot's Biggest Nerf yet
body: Poro's lost 99% of their max health wtf rito

replies.body: This is poroble news!!
Puns like that are the reason Graves doesnt have a cigar anymore >:((((
And also the reason he vapes now.
That pun is in poro taste
At first I didn't get this pun. I am such a poron.
That was a deporable pun
That pun is deporoble
I play an unhealthy amount of aram, but the second I read of the Poro health nerf, I knew that Riot had finally gone too far.
Riot only did this because people kept feeding poros becausethey don't know better. Ths is why I sell the cookie everytime. Git gut.
wait... you can sell the cookies???
You can, but not for gold.
for what then...? for the souls of starved poros?
For hatred of poro-lovers. Instant hatred, gluten free.
Does that mean you'll be looking for a new job then?

I made me wonder: why they had 100000 hp in the first place?
BTW, I play a lot of Aram because toxic player on SR.
feels bad man, they did not solve the 20% win rate difference on the annual patch.

thanks for caring about Draven I knew you look at this post!
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/p5KpLA1t-another-patch-78-and-no-mention-or-draven-bugs-addressed
Another example of riots "buffs". Who will gutted next, the shopkeepers???
Zeal items have reduced gold cost GG less money for shopkeeper, won't feed his family now.
The socialist Riot regime must be stopped! Can't they see that free market capitalism is the only way to properly balance item costs?

Patch 8.1
Every item has limited supply, and players must auction at the start of the game to determine the price of each item

I wonder for how much they would sell:
{{item:3056}}

How dare Riot?  This is going to far, even for them.

# #PoroLivesMatter

Yeah but now they don't die when they explode. 

Though, that sounds more painful than dying when you explode.
You think that's bad?  They also can't smell as far!   With the reduced life, they won't be able to find our delicious poro snax!  They'll  starve!

#Fixed a bug where poros would die when they exploded

Erm... what are they _supposed_ to do when they **explode**....

MAKE MORE POROS!?!??!

Guerrilla Warfare: Teemo P
Blood Scent: Warwick W
Wild Growth: Lulu R
Icathian Surprise: Kog'Maw P
Mimic: LeBlanc R
Get Excited: Jinx P

That spells... TWLKLJ
I guess there's nothing special here...

You didn't go far enough.

You have to use an alphabetic cypher and translate it into a different language.

AND they got their poro snax sense nerfed. Excuse YOU riot but I loved having cute little fluff companions follow me because i had a treat, I pretended they were super ninjas able to dodge the chaos of 5v5 teamfights all in the name of delicious snax! Now if i stray too far they leave me and i feel lonely and play worse.

How could you Riot. #MakePorosGreatAgain
Those nerfs hurt a lot but, when will Riot release a poro skin?
Poro Rider Sej?
I meant the poros in Howling Abyss lol
Well, as the meme says, 1000 times less of infinite is still infinite. Wait...
What monsters.
